products.title: KiTEC Industries (INDIA) Pvt. Ltd.
products.description: Being the Pioneer of multilayer pipes (PE-AL-PE) in India since 1996, KiTEC is now been recognised for its excellence in quality KiTEC pipe uses special polyethylene grade which is hygienic, non-toxic and smooth. The middle aluminum layer is impermeable. This structure provides KiTEC pipe the advantages of both metal and plastic while avoiding all the weaknesses associated with these materials.

products.title: HP ADHESIVES
products.description: HP Adhesives is a leading provider of adhesives and sealants. Our commitment to delivering world-class products and services to our customers drives us forward. We have strongly emphasized the quality, standard and price of our diverse range of products. Our dedicated research & development team is a mix of Indian and International capabilities that is constantly striving at improving our product range and building newer capabilities. With our constant drive for innovation, we have grown aggressively in various businesses and products, matching them with international standards. This has helped us launch over 25 unique products under the HP Adhesives Limited banner.

companyItems.itemDesc: Glazing application, general sealing and assembling, plumbing and sanitary applications, drought proofing, sealing doors & windows frames, port lights, backlights, etc. Sealing air conditioning system, for sanitary use.

Joints in the building industry between wood, metal window frames, UPVC doors & windows, concrete brickwork, joints between concrete and ceiling elements, between wall and ceiling skirting boards, window sills, sealing around pipe joints, sealing ductwork, sealing duct seams, wall Cracks filling, aerated concrete for inside and outside applications.

For interior and exterior applications like perimeter joints, building and another type of construction. Durable adhesion in the range including concrete, masonry, brick, UPVC, wood glass and glazed surfaces and some metals used in construction. Suitable for general applications.
Ultimate strength epoxy putty ideal for sealing leakages in plumbing, filling dents and cracks, insulating electrical connections.

Joints in the building industry between wood, metal window frames, UPVC doors & windows, concrete brickwork, joints between concrete and ceiling elements, between wall and ceiling skirting boards, window sills, sealing around pipe joints, sealing ductwork, sealing duct seams, wall Cracks filling, aerated concrete for inside and outside applications.

products.title: AZUD
products.description: At AZUD we have been working since 1989 in agricultural applications that optimise water, energy and nutrient consumption in irrigation and filtering systems. We are a benchmark in the manufacture of technologies for the efficient use of water. We help our customers increase the profitability and sustainability of their agricultural and industrial activity.We are a global company with headquarters in Spain and subsidiaries in India, Mexico, Brazil, China and Singapore, backed by more than 30 years of experience. We are present in more than 100 countries with an expert team of over 450 people worldwide.

companyItems.itemDesc: AZUD MODULAR 100 is the range of manual filters for exclusive use in water filtration for irrigation, made of plastic material that ensures easy handling, high resistance and durability for flow rates up to 25 m3/h (110 gpm).

products.title: AIPL ABRO
products.description: We wish to introduce ourself as channel partners of ABRO industries INC, USA in India. Our group's product profile is very wide ranging from self-adhesive tapes, Signage & outdoor advertising raw materials, plastics and polymers raw materials etc. with strong dealer network all over India. With distribution in over 175 countries, ABRO have attained worldwide recognition and prominence for the excellence and competitiveness of its products. ABRO is already a synonym for Automotive Paint masking tapes in India and brand is very much popular in auto care industry.

companyItems.itemDesc: AIPL ABRO SANDPAPER (OC) is a super quality, extremely durable special coated sandpaper available in different grits. Perfect for commercial and industrial purposes. Used for dry surfaces in sanding of walls, plastic filler, wood and fiber glass.

AIPL ABRO SANDPAPER (CPG) is a silicon based waterproof sanding paper used for both wet and dry surfaces. Mostly used in automotive industries. Used in both commercial and industrial purposes for sanding of various metals, furniture and other products.

AIPL ABRO SANDPAPER (LPN) is a premium waterproof abrasive paper. A super quality product extremely durable for commercial and industrial purposes mainly used in sanding of automotive products, metal fabrication and also in furniture and decorative products.

AIPL ABRO ABRASIVE CLOTH ROLL is used for general purpose hand and machine sanding needs, offers a wide selection of cloth rolls. These rolls provide consistent finish and durability. It is mainly used for grinding work ranging from heavy-duty grinding to precision abrasion of wood, metal, as well as glass, ceramics and other highly brittle materials.

AIPL ABRO PREMIUM FLEXIBLE DCD GRINDING WHEEL with best-in-class performance is a high-quality product which allows quick grinding solution and has great power. The unique structure of this wheel generates fresh cutting edges on the surfaces of various forms of metals ensuring great results. The fast and reliable grinding action increases productivity and saves time.These wheels are designed to work under high pressure production environments hence provides long working cycle to the abrasives. These wheels can be dangerous to use without safety and taking proper precautions.

Ideal for carpenters and painters, ABRO masking tape is a high-performance tape. Used in a variety of applications like painting, carpentry, manufacturing and so, ABRO tape uses are vast.ABRO multipurpose tape is thick because of which it gives a tear free & residue free result. This helps the contractors, painters and carpenters to save cost and also give results that add to their reputation and finishing. Engineered for performance, this tape is designed to have the perfect balance between paper and adhesive.

AIPL ABRO SELF ADHESIVE PVC INSULATION TAPES are self-extinguishing, stretchable molding tape which grips firmly to any surface and provides protection to wires of all electrical appliances and machines.AIPL ABRO ELECTRICAL INSULATION TAPES are the most flexible tapes in its class.

itemSizes.size: Black, Blue, Red, Green, Yellow, White
Black, Blue, Red, Green, Yellow, White

companyItems.itemDesc: With over 40+ spray paint colours to choose from, ABRO spray paint is the right choice for you. If you are looking for car spray paint in India, our range has the most comprehensive shades to meet your requirements. ABRO Spray Paint is a multi-purpose, fast-drying spray paint that is useful for exterior and/or interior applications on different types of surfaces for a quick premium finish.ABRO Spray Paint helps you to renew, refresh, and restore a wide variety of objects like furniture, toys, lamps, cabinets, bicycles, doors, and many more. Meeting the demands of the renovation segment, our spray paintwork can be used on wood, metal, acrylic, and other large variety of surfaces.

AIPL Abro PTFE Thread Sealing Tape, Also known as AIPL Abro Plumber’s Tape is a premium quality sealing tape made with highly versatile thread sealant and lubricating material. It is primarily used in piping and ductwork applications. PTFE stands for polytetrafluoroethylene, which is hydrophobic (meaning it repels water). Our PTFE Thread Sealing Tapes are made from 100% virgin PTFE and are used for all applications in water, oil, chemical, medical, and food processing industries where non-contamination standards are high.

ZORROGUARD PROTECTION TAPE is designed to prevent surfaces from scratches, marks during handling, transit, post installation, etc. This tape gives excellent scratch resistance and masking properties and thereby coated with non-transfer type especially adhesive, to withstand abrasions and scratches on smooth and sensitive surface.

AIPL Roller Masker is an effortless solution to mask/cover electronic appliances and large objects to protect them against any paint job or wood work activity. It is a high density, non-porous film that holds for longer time, leaving minimum residue. It is a multi-purpose masker tape with its application in painting, industrial, automotive & packaging Industry.

AIPL ABRO BOPP Packaging Tapes are made of Biaxial Oriented Polypropylene (BOPP) film which gives it excellent Mechanical and Optical properties. The raw material used, is a thermoplastic polymer, which helps the tape stay effective in both higher and lower temperatures. With its superior quality adhesive and tensile strength, it is an ideal product for packaging and labeling applications.
AIPL ABRO Anti Slip Tape is widely used in slipping places where objects cause humidity.

ABRO® PU Foam Insulation Sealant is a one-component, CFC free, ready to use, multipurpose Polyurethane foam adhesive and mounting foam with non-flammable propellant. It is fitted with a plastic adapter head for use with a foam application gun or a straw. ABRO® PU Foam Insulation Sealant is very good for filling and sealing with excellent mounting capacities, high thermal and acoustical insulation. The cured foam is self-extinguishable, rigid and has a fine structure with partly closed cells.

products.title: MYMIX
products.description: Established in Mumbai in 1963 by the Mumbai-based Sanghavi family 'Sanghavi Group' is known for innovative concepts, integrity of design and quality workmanship in the field of manufacturing high quality engineering equipments and products, with factories in Mumbai, Hyderabad and Nagpur. It is our strength to have practical knowledge and advantage of combined expertise that encourages us to invent and introduce new products gives us a competitive edge.

companyItems.itemDesc: MyMix Tile Adhesive is formulated polymer modified, flexible glue that can be used to fix different types of tiles including mosaic tiles, ceramic tiles, clay & ceramic (non-vitrified) tiles of small and large dimensions, engineered and all natural stone tiles amongst others. Different range of tile adhesives are used for different sizes of tiles and stones and different area of application.

MyMix Ritepoxy ESG 1200 (Epoxy Stain-free Grout) is a three-component epoxy grout designed especially for use in filling up joints of ceramic tiles, vitrified tiles and joints, where hygiene is of utmost importance. It is easy to apply, chemical resistant and available in more than 28 shades.

MyMix Ritepoxy Glitter Star (Epoxy Stain-free Grout) is three component epoxy base tile grouts designed especially for floor & wall areas where sparkling effect, metallic finish of aesthetics is of utmost importance such as hotels, restaurants, kitchens, showrooms, living room, swimming pool & shopping malls. Ritepoxy glitter star grout is easy to apply, easy to mix joints filler and available in more than 28 shades in Gold, Silver and Copper finish. It is particularly recommended for glass mosaic & metallic tiles.

MyMix CGU (Cementitious colour grout) is white cement based, polymer modified colour grout. It is right bonding materials to fill tile joints to fix ceramic & vitrified tiles on walls and floors. They are resistant to shrinkage and cracking and can be used to fill tile joints (walls and floors) with a minimum width of 1 to 5 mm for both interior and exterior applications. Made with colour fast pigments and fine graded aggregates. It is available in more than 28 colours to match your joints with tiles.

MyMix Grout Admixture 990 is liquid polymer admixture for used to improve the quality of cement grouts. It is ideal for interior and exterior tile grout application and enhances flexibility & durability to have better performance. Specially designed for use with CGU Grout.

MyMix Multiple Cleaner is acid-based cleaner for multiple cleaning activities. It is specially formulated to remove stubborn stains and grime from a variety of surfaces. It is an eco-friendly & cost-effective cleaner that can easily dissolve and remove dirt, grease, and other contaminants, make surfaces clean and aesthetically superior.

IWP (Integral Waterproofing Compound) is an advanced additive specifically formulated to enhance the waterproofing properties of concrete. It is designed to be incorporated directly into concrete mixtures, offering exceptional integral waterproofing capabilities. Adding WP to concrete, significantly improves the durability and longevity of structures by providing superior protection against water penetration.

SBR 330 is modified Styrene Butadiene Rubber based Multipurpose and high-quality Latex. It is in liquid consistency and can be utilized as a Bonding Agent, as Quality Enhancer in Repair Mortar, as a good waterproofing agent and as Primer coating in Cementitious applications. It is ideal to apply internal and external applications to intermix with cement.

SUPER LATEX 770 is high quality super latex additive to be mixed with premium Adhesive and cement mixes. Super latex 770 added with Ritebuild UTA to provide strong bonding with high flexibility to various substrates. It is suitable for all size tiles & stone fixing, fixing granite, marble and all other natural stones on wall. It is also suitable for plaster work as bond coat. It should be used for interior application only.

MCR (Microconcrete) is cementitious, non-shrink, pourable, high strength for structure repair with high precision concrete. It is specially designed for restoring horizontal concrete surfaces damaged through concrete spalling and mechanical causes. It is recommended for thickness from 20 to 100 mm. It is suitable for various structural strengthening measures such as encasement build-ups, jacketing etc.

Repair Mortar HS is high strength build up structural repair mortar formulated with graded fillers, additive, cement and fibers. It can be applied by trowel and wet spraying, suitable for overhead and vertical application with excellent bonding characteristics to steel reinforcement and concrete. It is specifically designed with double action shrinkage resistant, low permeability with thixotropic nature, ready to use product.

CCF (Cementitious Crack Filler) is single component cement-based crack filling compound, it is formulated & modified for non-shrink cementitious compositions for filling cracks in concrete, masonry & plaster surfaces and it is easy to apply and can be finished or smoothened with a putty blade/damp sponge. It sets quickly on application and can be over coated with common paints/ coatings.

products.title: TERMIGUARD
products.description: Advance Agrisearch Limited is a well know ISO 9001-2008 Certified Company dedicated to manufacturing superior and economically priced Adhesive, Wood Preservatives, House Hold Insect Control and Speciality Building use products.The Company is a leading supplier of its products to a large number of small industries, Indian Defence establishments, Railways, shipping industries, forest departments, wood treatment plants and Govt. Institutions.

companyItems.itemDesc: A ready-to-use Colourless oil-borne Bio-wood preservative for prevention and control of termite infestation, fungus & borers for effective protection of plywood, wood and furniture. Termiguard is eco-friendly and harmless to human beings and pets as proven over use during the last more than 15 years. This does not affect the color of furniture and ply wood. Its application increases the life span of wood by 10 to 15 years.

An emulsifiable concentrate made from azeotropic extract of Anacardium Pericarp for protection of building foundations and soil to prevent termites and wood eating pests to prolong life of wood & building structures. This is also used in glue-mix for manufacturing of termite resistant plywood and hard board. It is also used for mixing in exterior paints to prevent weather resultant dark spots due to fungus to prolong the life of paints. It is widely used for household pest control and is ideal for treatment of soil and structures for prevention of Termites infestation for more than 20 years effectively.

A ready-to-use Colourless oil-borne Bio-wood preservative for prevention and control of termite infestation, fungus & borers for effective protection of plywood, wood and furniture. It comes in the form of trigger spray which is easy to use and can cover places which are difficult to reach.

products.title: ATUL
products.description: Atul is a pioneer in manufacturing epoxy resins in India. The Company is one of the largest manufacturers of epoxy resins and hardeners in the country. The epoxy products are marketed and sold under the brand name of Lapox and that of synthetic rubber and PU based adhesives under the brand name of Polygrip. A new range of maintenance products are being marketed under the brand name of Lacare.

companyItems.itemDesc: Ultimate strength epoxy adhesive ideal for fixing marble and granite in kitchens and window frames, sand broadcasting, assembly of marble temples, woodwork and grouting steel railings.

companyItems.itemTitle: Lapox Rapid and Clear Tube & Jar
companyItems.itemDesc: Rapid setting clear epoxy adhesive ideal for bonding marble to marble, glass to glass, wood to wood and wood to glass.
Cyanoacrylate adhesive ideal for gap filling in PVC doors, furniture and pasting flex banners on MS frames.
Ultimate strength epoxy putty ideal for sealing leakages in plumbing, filling dents and cracks, insulating electrical connections.
Multi-purpose white coloured epoxy putty ideal for sealing and filling gaps in  bathrooms, kitchens and handicrafts.
Solvent cement for heavy duty PVC pipes and fittings ideal for pipes and fittings used for potable water, sewers and irrigation.

Solvent cement for CPVC pipes and fittings ideal for pipes and fittings used for cold and hot water up to a maximum of 180oF (82oC) installed in residential complexes, commercial spaces, mobile homes and industrial premises.
Multi-purpose maintenance spray ideal for automobiles, industrial use and common household applications.
Two-component, modified epoxy system ideal for wooden handicraft, fixing stones, marble, grouting steel railings, stone mosaic and fixing gem stones.
Epoxy adhesive for vertical cladding ideal for vertical cladding of marble, granite and stone on concrete, plywood, cement fiber boards, metal and underwater tile fixing.

Stain-free, waterproof epoxy tile grout for walls and floors ideal for tile joints in kitchens, bathrooms, swimming pools and high footfall areas in homes, institutions, industries and food processing units.
Two-component, solvent-free, modified epoxy system ideal for coating and crack filling in natural marble, granite, italian marble and stone casting.
Advanced, heat resistant and quick bonding adhesive ideal for bonding ply to laminate, laminate to laminate and metal to laminate.

products.title: ZYDEX
products.description: Traditional waterproofing methods rely on chemicals and membranes that create a surface barrier like an umbrella or band-aid to prevent water from entering civil structures. However, they are limited in their ability to penetrate micro cracks and pore channels. Over time, these products tend to peel and crack due to thermal and UV degradation, resulting in a failed waterproofing system.Zydex has developed a revolutionary nanotechnology-based waterproofing solution that creates a chemical bond with the surface. This advanced penetrative nanotechnology can penetrate the structure, altering its basic nature from hydrophilic to hydrophobic, thereby making it water-resistant. This effectively prevents water from entering and slows down the aging process of the structure, leading to a significant increase in its lifespan and optimal use of resources.

companyItems.itemDesc: Organosilane Technology;Reactive,Penetrative & Permanent;Easy to Apply;Breathable & UV Resistant;Protects against Algae and Fungal Growth;Waterproofs Vertical and Horizontal Surfaces;Protects Substrate from Deterioration due to Weathering
Sealing & Bonding Agent;Multipurpose & Economical;Excellent Wet Adhesion;Universal Compatibility;Excellent Bonding to Cementitious Concrete & Plaster Surfaces;High-performance Cement Admixture

Reduces Porosity;Excellent Water Resistance;Excellent Wet Adhesion;Strong Bonding (17 N/mm) to Cementitious Concrete & Plaster Surfaces
High Elongation Elastomeric Waterproofing Membrane;Crosslinking & UV Durable;250% Elongation;Can be Used as a Mortar Mix with Sand and Cement
White Stretchable Membrane;UV Durable & Crosslinking;Crack-Bridging up to 1.5 mm;5-year service life;Ready to use
White Stretchable Membrane;UV Durable & Crosslinking;Crack-Bridging up to 1.5 mm;5 years’ service life;To be used in combination with Zycosil+

High Elongation up to 175 % depending on grey cement addition quantity;Elastomeric Waterproofing Membrane has excellent bonding to cement, metal and stone surfaces;Crosslinking & UV Durable up to 5 years
Extremely Strong Adhesion on Cementitious Surfaces;Easy to Apply;Highly Water Resistant
Reactive Bonding to Concrete & Plaster Surfaces;Strong and Flexible Bond resulting in Monolithic Joints;Highly Water Resistant;Pull-off Strength of 17 N/mm2
Improves Workability;Enhances Concrete Quality;Minimises Porosity and;Honeycombing;Increases Setting Time;Higher Strength

Matt Emulsion is a premium interior paint with a rich matt finish. It's inherent deep matt effect and carefully selected pigments provide unsurpassed color depth and brilliancy even in the most difficult lighting conditions. Matt Emulsion's ability to hide surface defects leads to an even and consistent finish even at sharp angles. The paint is extremely resistant to burnishing and mechanical abrasion making it suitable for even the most demanding high traffic interior spaces. Being highly breathable, it is extremely resistant to peel-off and blistering. Designed for excellent dirt release, it is easily washable and highly scrub resistant. Available in a white and pastel tones. It has density of 1.3-1.6 g/cm3.

Xtend Pro is an organo-silicate paint for exterior application. Made using only lightfast pigments it offers a service life of 5+ years without fading or peeling. Its special organo-silicate binder and unique filler composition offers excellent dirt pickup resistance and its inherent breathability combined with water repellent nature inhibits algae and fungal growth. Xtend Pro has a brilliant matt appearance that enhances light reflectivity and effectively hides surface defects. Available in 49+ durable shades.

Xtend is a premium paint for exterior application. Made using only lightfast pigments it offers a service life of 7+ years without fading or peeling. Its special binder design and unique filler composition offers excellent dirt pickup resistance and its inherent breathability combined with water repellent nature inhibits algae and fungal growth. Xtend has a mineral matt appearance that enhances light reflectivity and effectively hides surface defects. Available in 49+ durable shades.

Xtend Ultra is a high-performance paint for exterior application. Made using only lightfast inorganic pigments it offers a service life of 10+ years without fading or peeling. Its combination of a special binder design and unique fillers offer excellent dirt pickup resistance. Its inherent breathability and water impermeability naturally inhibits algae and fungal growth. Xtend Ultra has a mineral matt appearance that enhances light reflectivity and effectively hides surface defects. Available in 49+ durable shades.

Stonix is an ultra-durable mineral paint with a binder system comprising potassium silicate for exterior application. Made using only lightfast inorganic pigments it offers a service-life of 15+ years without fading or peeling when applied on mineral surfaces. It’s purely mineral character offers extreme dirt pickup resistance and its inherent alkalinity inhibits algae and fungal growth. Stonix has an ultra-matt appearance that enhances light reflectivity and effectively hides surface defects. Its inherent crystallinity provides unsurpassed color depth. Available in 230-long lasting shades.

Pro Emulsion is a premium interior paint with a rich matt finish. It's inherent deep matt effect and carefully selected pigments provide unsurpassed color depth and brilliancy even in the most difficult lighting conditions. Pro Emulsion's ability to hide surface defects leads to an even and consistent finish even at sharp angles. The paint is extremely resistant to burnishing and mechanical abrasion making it suitable for even the most demanding high traffic interior spaces. Being highly breathable, it is extremely resistant to peel-off and blistering. Designed for excellent dirt release, it is easily washable and highly scrub resistant. Available in a white and pastel tones. It has density of 1.3-1.4 g/cm3.

Premium Matt is a premium interior paint with a rich matt finish. It's inherent deep matt effect and carefully selected pigments provide unsurpassed color depth and brilliancy even in the most difficult lighting conditions. Premium Matt's ability to hide surface defects leads to an even and consistent finish even at sharp angles. The paint is extremely resistant to burnishing and mechanical abrasion making it suitable for even the most demanding high traffic interior spaces. Being highly breathable, it is extremely resistant to peel-off and blistering. Designed for excellent dirt release, it is easily washable and highly scrub resistant. Available in a wide range of colours. It has density of 1.35-1.45 g/cm3.

Zydex Premium Wall Primer is an acrylic water-based wall primer with excellent bonding and hiding characteristics. It has excellent standability and provides a smooth base for over-painting. It is suitable for exterior and interior applications.

The middle aluminum layer is impermeable. This structure provides KiTEC pipe the advantages of both metal and plastic while avoiding all the weaknesses associated with these materials.

services.description: Being the Pioneer of multilayer pipes (PE-AL-PE) in India since 1996, KiTEC is now been recognised for its excellence in quality KiTEC pipe uses special polyethylene grade which is hygienic, non-toxic and smooth. The middle aluminum layer is impermeable. This structure provides KiTEC pipe the advantages of both metal and plastic while avoiding all the weaknesses associated with these materials.
